Package org.trianacode.gui.action.taskgraph

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClearAction
    Action class to handle all "clear" actions.
    FlushAction
    Action class to handle all "Flush" actions.
    GroupAction
    Action class to handle all "select all" actions.
    OrganizeAction
    Action class to handle all "select all" actions.
    PauseAction
    Action class to handle all "pause" actions.
    ResetAction
    Action class to handle all "reset" actions.
    ResolveNodesAction
    The action for showing the node editor
    RunAction
    Action class to handle all "run" actions.
    SelectAllAction
    Action class to handle all "select all" actions.
    TabbedDesktopAction
    Action class to handle all "clear" actions.
    TrianaWorkflowVerifier
    Checks a pre-run workflow to see whether it has any ProtoServices, and if so prompts the user to distribute these services or cancel the run.
    UnGroupAction
    Action class to handle all "Ungroup" actions.
    VirtualDesktopAction
    Action class to handle all "clear" actions.
    ZoomAction
    Action class to handle all "select all" actions.
    ZoomOutAction
    Action class to handle all "select all" actions.
